pages.text: The $(mob)Rabbit$() is an animal found in some biomes in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It hops around and flees when hit. The color of its fur depends on the biome it spawned in.$(p)It also will periodically eat $(item)Carrot$() crops nearby. It can be bred using $(item)Carrots$(), $(item)Golden Carrots$() or $(item)Dandelions$(). Its meat is a poor source of food alone but it can be crafted into $(item)Rabbit Stew$().
$(mob)Rabbits$() also drop $(item)Rabbit Hide$() on death. It can be crafted into $(l:minecraft_cow)$(item)Leather$().
$(mob)Rabbits$() also rarely drop a $(item)Rabbit's Foot$() on death. It can be used to brew $(item)Potions of Leaping$().
